demo.message:
Hello %user%. I'm Cartes, the intelligent robot of RPA Suite. This example shows how to create processes using C# libraries with Cartes.
1 - Create a class library (.NET Framework) with a class to handle the application. Inherited from MyCartesAPIBase.
2 - Create a Windows Forms application (.NET Framework) and delete the form. Create a class that implements the process, inherited from MyCartesProcessBase.
